entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this morning then becoming light this afternoon. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
